data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Bilbao at Mestalla.
Valencia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Bilbao throw-in in Valencia's half.
Bilbao needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Valencia are caught offside.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 7, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 9, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Valencia defence as Iker Muniain fires in a strike for Bilbao.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Can Bilbao capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Valencia Bilbao attack through Inigo Martinez. The finish is off target, however.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Throw-in Valencia.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Bilbao at Mestalla.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia.
Free kick Valencia.
In the minute 20, In Valencia, Goncalo Guedes of Valencia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 23, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Valencia have been awarded a penalty in Valencia...
Yunus Musah hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Valencia!
In the minute 26, Carlos Soler nets and Valencia now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Valencia.
Bilbao's Iker Muniain gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valencia defender.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao's Yuri Berchiche is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 30, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
At Mestalla, Mikel Vesga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 32, Goncalo Guedes for Valencia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Mestalla.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Valencia.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Valencia.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Maxi Gomez (Valencia) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Valencia.
Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 44, Valencia to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's first substitution at Mestalla with Unai Lopez replacing Mikel Vesga.
In the minute 47, Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Bilbao push upfield but Carlos Del Cerro Grande quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 49, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Valencia a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 53, Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Asier Villalibre grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Mestalla.
Yuri Berchiche with an assist there.
In the minute 56, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Valencia throw-in in Bilbao's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 60, Denis Cheryshev is replacing Yunus Musah for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Valencia.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Dani Garcia for Bilbao has been booked by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Bilbao throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 64, Bilbao's Alex Berenguer breaks free at Mestalla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Valencia.
In the minute 67, Oscar De Marcos is on a sub for Ander Capa for Bilbao.
In the minute 68, Free kick Bilbao.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a second substitution, with Thierry Correia replacing Daniel Wass.
The home team have replaced Goncalo Guedes with Jason. This is the third substitution made today by Javi Gracia.
In the minute 72, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Bilbao.
In the minute 73, Unai Lopez is booked for the away team.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
In the minute 75, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Valencia's area.
In the minute 78, An attacking Bilbao player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
The away team replace Asier Villalibre with Raul Garcia.
Raul Garcia smashes in a penalty at Mestalla. The score is now 1-2.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Valencia!
Yeray Alvarez (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Goal! Manu Vallejo (Valencia) levels the score at 2-2 with a header.
Carlos Soler instrumental with a fine assist.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Alex Berenguer (Bilbao) has received a first yellow card.
Bilbao make their fourth substitution with Unai Nunez replacing Iker Muniain.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Valencia in Valencia.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Bilbao a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Valencia's Jason has been booked in Valencia.
Raul Garcia (Bilbao) gets a yellow card.
